hero.title: Training Graduate Program
hero.description: Helping Libya's top young talent build real skills with hands-on projects and expert support.

motivation.title: The Motivation
motivation.description: Smart graduates were struggling to get their first real‑world experience.

market.title: The Market
market.description: Great companies were searching for job‑ready talent to help them grow.

bridge.title: The Bridge
bridge.description: We connect both sides with elite skills, real projects, and mentorship that turns potential into performance.

targets.title: What We Provide
targets.description: A tight community of motivated learners and ambitious organizations.

target.title: What We Provide
target.description: Ambitious students and graduates (born 1999+) in fields intersecting with technology, data, and innovation.

goal.title: Our Goal
goal.description: Create a pipeline of job‑ready professionals who can drive Libya's digital transformation.

tracks.title: Program Tracks
tracks.description: Choose a focus area while building shared professional foundations.

ai.title: AI & Data Analysis
ai.description: From data wrangling to applied machine learning and analytics storytelling.

development.title: Software & App Development
development.description: Modern web and app engineering fundamentals, tooling, testing, and delivery.

cybersecurity.title: Cybersecurity Networking & Telecommunications
cybersecurity.description: Foundations of secure systems, networks, and resilient digital infrastructure.

phases.title: Program Phases
phases.description: A clear, fair pathway from application to selection.

application.title: Online Application
application.description: Candidates submit personal details and documents

training.title: Training
training.description: Candidates participate in a comprehensive training program.

geographicGlobe.title: Global Talent, Local Impact
geographicGlobe.subtitle: Applicants from across the MENA region

partners.title: Powered by
partners.description: Leading organizations supporting the Training Graduate Program

contact.title: Get in touch about TGP
contact.description: Questions about applications, phases, or partnerships? Reach us and we'll help you join, support, or hire from the Training Graduate Program.
